channel.title: Enumerated fields on IGDB.com API Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Enumerated fields on IGDB.com API Documentation

item.title: Achievement Rank
item.description: Description: The rank of the achievement Playstation Values Value Rank Name 1 Bronze 2 Silver 3 Gold 4 Platinum

item.title: Achievement Source
item.description: Description: The service where the achievement is located Values Value Service Name 1 Playstation 2 XBOX 3 Steam

item.title: Credit category
item.description: Description: The type of entry in an end credits list. Values Value Category 1 voice_actor 2 language 3 company_credit 4 employee 5 misc 6 support_company

item.title: Date category
ESRB rating
item.description: Values Value Rating 1 RP 2 EC 3 E 4 E10+ 5 T 6 M 7 AO

item.title: Feed Item Category
item.description: Value Category Explanation 1 Pulse Article Kotaku news article 2 Coming Soon Final Fantasy XXXVIII is releasing in 7 days 3 New Trailer New trailer added to a game 5 User Contributed Item New feed item created by a user 6 User contributions item User has changed a game release date 7 Page Contributed Item New feed item created by a page

item.title: Game category
item.description: Values Value Category 0 Main game 1 DLC / Addon 2 Expansion 3 Bundle 4 Standalone expansion

item.title: Game status
item.description: Values Value Status 0 Released 2 Alpha 3 Beta 4 Early access 5 Offline 6 Cancelled

item.title: Gender
item.description: Values Value Text 0 Male 1 Female 2 Unknown

item.title: Region
item.description: Values Value Region 1 Europe (EU) 2 North America (NA) 3 Australia (AU) 4 New Zealand (NZ) 5 Japan (JP) 6 China (CH) 7 Asia (AS) 8 Worldwide 9 Hong Kong (HK) 10 South Korea (KR)

item.title: Species
item.description: Values Value Text 1 Human 2 Alien 3 Animal 4 Android 5 Unknown

item.title: Website category
item.description: Values Value Category 1 official 2 wikia 3 wikipedia 4 facebook 5 twitter 6 twitch 8 instagram 9 youtube 10 iphone 11 ipad 12 android 13 steam 14 Reddit
